metadata.feature_description: Modify user's reputation and experience points with validation and note tracking

steps.action: Navigate to Users panel and click on User Activity icon for a user
steps.expected: User Activity details panel opens showing Rank, Reputation, Experience, and Edit Points link
steps.actual: User Activity panel opened showing Rank: 2, Reputation: 6, Experience: 8, and Edit Points link visible

steps.expected: Edit mode toggles on with textboxes for Reputation and Experience, Notes field, and Cancel/Save buttons
steps.actual: Edit mode toggled on successfully with editable textboxes for Reputation (6), Experience (8), Notes field, and Cancel/Save buttons

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Edit reputation points with valid value

steps.action: Enter edit mode and change reputation from 6 to 7
steps.expected: Reputation field accepts the new value

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Edit experience points with valid value

steps.expected: Experience field accepts the new value

steps.action: Enter multiline note in the Notes field
steps.actual: Notes field accepted multiline text: 'Test edit - adjusting points via UI test' and 'Line 2 of note for multiline test'

steps.action: Click Save button after editing values (Reputation: 7, Experience: 10)
steps.expected: Changes are saved, edit mode closes, and new values are displayed
steps.actual: Changes saved successfully. Edit mode closed. Reputation now shows 7, Experience shows 10. Values reflected immediately in UI

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Cancel changes and verify reset to original values

steps.action: Enter edit mode and change Reputation to 99, Experience to 100

steps.expected: Changes are discarded, edit mode closes, values reset to original (7 and 10)
steps.actual: Changes discarded successfully. Edit mode closed. Values reset to Reputation: 7, Experience: 10

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Attempt to set negative experience (should fail with error)

steps.action: Enter edit mode and set experience to -5

steps.expected: Save fails with validation error, edit mode remains active
steps.actual: Save failed with server error (500 Internal Server Error from SaveUserPoints API). Edit mode remained active with the invalid value. Server-side validation correctly rejected negative experience points

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Attempt to set reputation greater than experience (should fail)

steps.action: Set Reputation to 20 and Experience to 5

steps.expected: Save fails with validation error stating reputation cannot exceed experience
steps.actual: Save failed with server error (500 Internal Server Error from SaveUserPoints API). Edit mode remained active. Server-side validation correctly rejected reputation greater than experience

observations: Feature is only available in DNNSOCIAL SKU - code checks utilities.getSKU() === 'DNNSOCIAL' before showing Edit Points link
User Activity tab is hidden for superuser accounts (isSuperUser check in showUserActivity function)
EDIT_POINTS permission is required along with SHOW_USER_ACTIVITY permission to see the Edit Points link
Validation errors from server are displayed via utilities.notifyError() but notifications may auto-dismiss quickly
The delta calculation for points works correctly - the system calculates the difference between new and current values before saving
Notes field supports multiline input via textarea element
